/* KioskOptionMapper.getKioskOptionProdList */
SELECT ( SELECT SF_GET_PROD_CLASSES('H', thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD, thp.PROD_CLASS_CD) FROM DUAL ) AS PROD_CLASS_NM, thp.PROD_CD AS OPTION_PROD_CD, thp.PROD_NM AS OPTION_PROD_NM
FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp, ( SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, PROD_CD, BARCD_CD AS BAR_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_BARCD WHERE 1=1 ) thpb WHERE 1=1 AND thpb.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thpb.PROD_CD (+)= thp.PROD_CD AND thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{membrOrgnCd}
AND thp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'|| #{optionProdCd} ||'%'
AND thp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'|| #{optionProdNm} ||'%'
AND thpb.BAR_CD LIKE '%'|| #{barCd} ||'%'
AND thp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} CONNECT BY P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_OPTION WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND OPTION_PROD_CD = thp.PROD_CD AND PROD_CD = #{prodCd} ) ORDER BY thp.PROD_CD
SELECT ( SELECT SF_GET_PROD_CLASSES('S', tmp.STORE_CD, tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD) FROM DUAL ) AS PROD_CLASS_NM, tmp.PROD_CD AS OPTION_PROD_CD, tmp.PROD_NM AS OPTION_PROD_NM
FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp, ( SELECT STORE_CD, PROD_CD, BARCD_CD AS BAR_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_BARCD WHERE 1=1 ) tmpb WHERE 1=1 AND tmpb.STORE_CD (+)= tmp.STORE_CD AND tmpb.PROD_CD (+)= tmp.PROD_CD AND tmp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd}
AND tmp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'|| #{optionProdCd} ||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'|| #{optionProdNm} ||'%'
AND tmpb.BAR_CD LIKE '%'|| #{barCd} ||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE 1=1 AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} CONNECT BY P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_OPTION WHERE 1=1 AND STORE_CD = tmp.STORE_CD AND OPTION_PROD_CD = tmp.PROD_CD AND PROD_CD = #{prodCd} ) ORDER BY tmp.PROD_CD
